Tolkien-related events that took place in 2002.

content.title: January
content.content:
1 - A Tolkien Miscellany is published.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 43 is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
6 - Fan site Council of Elrond goes online.
24 - The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring wins four Oscars, out of thirteen nominations, at the 74th Academy Awards.

content.title: May
content.content: 29 - The mailing list Lambengolmor is launched.

content.title: June
content.content:
6 - At the MTV Movie Awards, Lord of the Piercing is aired.
12 - The Art of The Fellowship of the Ring is published.
18 - The Standard Deviants: Rings, Kings and Things is released.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 44 is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
12 - Przemyslaw Mroczkowski, scholar and friend of J.R.R. Tolkien, dies.
22 - Actor Alexander John dies.
25 - The Uncharted Realms of Tolkien is published.
26-29 - Mythcon 33.

content.title: August
content.content:
5 - The History of Middle-earth Index is published.
8 - Tolkien Thing IV.
16 - The Annotated Hobbit: Revised and Expanded Edition is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
13-15 - Oxonmoot 2002.
24 - The Xbox and GBA ports of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game) are published in the US.
26 - I.L. Gordon dies.

content.title: October
content.content:
5 - The Ellinikós Sýllogos Philon Tólkin is founded.
16 - The PS2 port of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game) is published in the US.
22 - The PC port of The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game) is published in the US.

content.title: November
content.content:
2 - The symposium "J.R.R. Tolkien: The Man Behind The Lord of the Rings" is held at the Arizona Center for Medieval and Renaissance Studies. Tom Shippey, Randel Helms and Ron Newcomer speak.
6 - The Lord of the Rings: The Making of the Movie Trilogy is published.
12 - The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring Extended Edition is released on DVD.
13 - The South Park episode "The Return of the Fellowship of the Ring to the Two Towers" is televised.
29 - John Justin, who played Thorin in The Hobbit (1968 radio series), dies.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien's Sanctifying Myth: Understanding Middle-earth is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
5 - The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers premieres at Ziegfeld Theatre, in New York City.
6 - The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers Photo Guide is published.
10 - The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack is released.
18 - The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers is released in USA.
19 - The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers is released in New Zealand.
? - Dragon Flame is released.

? - At Dawn in Rivendell, the third album of the Tolkien Ensemble, is published.
? - The audiobook of The Hobbit, read by Rob Inglis, is published.
